heading: Cloud Computing Platforms
paragraph: Tried, tested, and reviewed by the community

productCards.title: Vercel — Seamless hosting for frontend developers
productCards.description: Vercel is a platform for frontend developers to deploy and manage web applications efficiently. It offers serverless infrastructure and integrations with popular frameworks and tools, focusing on performance and scalability.

productCards.title: Supabase — The open source Firebase alternative
productCards.description: Supabase is an open-source backend-as-a-service that provides real-time databases, authentication, and API services. It enables developers to build and scale applications quickly without managing server infrastructure.

productCards.title: Firebase — An app development platform backed by Google
productCards.description: An app development platform that helps you build and grow apps and games users love. Backed by Google and trusted by millions of businesses around the world.

productCards.title: Google Cloud Platform — A suite of cloud computing services by Google
productCards.description: Build with generative AI, deploy apps fast, and analyze data in seconds with Google-grade security.

productCards.title: DigitalOcean — A cloud platform to deploy, manage & scale apps of any size
productCards.description: Helping millions of developers easily build, test, manage, and scale applications of any size faster than ever before.

productCards.title: Render — Build, deploy, and scale your apps with unparalleled ease
productCards.description: A unified platform to build and run all your apps and websites with free SSL, a global CDN, private networks and auto deploys from Git.

productCards.title: Ruby on Rails — A full-stack framework to build amazing web apps
productCards.description: Rendering HTML templates, updating databases, sending and receiving emails, maintaining live pages via WebSockets, enqueuing jobs for asynchronous work, storing uploads in the cloud, providing solid security protections for common attacks. Rails does it all and so much more.

productCards.title: replicate — source machine learning models with a cloud API
Amazon Web Services — Virtual private server and web hosting-Amazon Lightsail
productCards.description: Amazon Lightsail is an easy-to-use virtual private server (VPS) that offers simple management of cloud resources such as containers, at low, predictable prices.

productCards.title: Upstash — Serverless data platform for Redis and Kafka
productCards.description: Serverless Redis and Kafka as a service with per request pricing. Use any Redis/Kafka clients. The built-in REST API enables use cases with serverless and edge functions.
